ultronFund.title: Ultron Fund
ultronFund.description: Ultron is a quantitative hedge fund that delivers strong absolute returns across market cycles through a proprietary automated strategy based on the machine learning of the market data analysis; Ultron investing predominantly in leveraged Bitcoin markets to generate consistent alpha over a proven track record.

ventureFund.title: Venture Fund
ventureFund.description: Initial Ventures is an early-stage venture capital firm that focuses on decentralized finance, blockchain infrastructure, and Web3 innovation. We partner with ambitious founders building the future of digital assets and decentralized systems.
